originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Azov’s hiring spree: Controversial Ukrainian brigade competes for recruits
title: Azov’s hiring spree: Controversial Ukrainian brigade competes for recruits
content: As the Ukrainian army's conscription crisis grows, individual military units are targeting potential fighters.

originalTitle: ‘Index of Repression:’ documents 964 anti-Palestinian cases in the UK
title: ‘Index of Repression:’ documents 964 anti-Palestinian cases in the UK
content: The European Legal Support Center says it’s verified nearly a thousand cases of “anti-Palestinian repression” in the UK.

originalTitle: What we know about clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan
title: What we know about clashes between Pakistan and Afghanistan
content: Clashes along the Pakistan-Afghanistan border have escalated to strikes on Kabul and other cities.

originalTitle: Pakistan defence minister says country in 'open war' with Afghanistan after strikes
title: Pakistan defence minister says country in 'open war' with Afghanistan after strikes
content: The latest attacks by Pakistan follow months of clashes between the two countries. despite agreeing to a fragile ceasefire in October.

originalTitle: What we know after latest escalation in Pakistan-Afghanistan tensions
title: What we know after latest escalation in Pakistan-Afghanistan tensions
content: Bombings by Pakistan are the most significant development in tensions between the two neighbours - though the physical impact remains unclear.

originalTitle: Why Trump means the Cuban Revolution faces its biggest threat yet
title: Why Trump means the Cuban Revolution faces its biggest threat yet
content: Will a worsening internal crisis create the conditions for the Cuban Revolution to unravel from within?

originalTitle: Chelsea to face holders PSG in Champions League last 16
title: Chelsea to face holders PSG in Champions League last 16
content: Chelsea will play holders Paris St-Germain in the Champions League last 16 while Manchester City will face Real Madrid in the knockout stages for a fifth straight season.

originalTitle: Gordon needs to stay 'fully focused' after Arsenal talk - Howe
title: Gordon needs to stay 'fully focused' after Arsenal talk - Howe
content: Head coach Eddie Howe has urged Anthony Gordon to stay "fully focused" after the Newcastle United forward was linked with a move to Arsenal.

originalTitle: 'Don't know what fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
title: 'Don't know what fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
content: Key players have gone, the manager is leaving and has criticised the club and upset fans - yet Crystal Palace's chaotic campaign could still end in European glory.
